description: Sometimes you need to really appreciate your body, you have to go out of it. In the second episode of Wilde Road, a confused Christian Wilde wakes on the patio of pair of boyfriends (Jimmy Durano, Troy Daniels). They're a couple in that inimitable California style -physically hot, spiritually deep and romantically flexible. The boys explain to Christian that gay sex doesn't have to be dark, telling him about their relationship, and the joys of tantric sex. Then they practice what they preach - and show him how two bodies can become one hot, throbbing, intense animal. Christian becomes entranced - to say the least - but will he join in?
title: Wilde Road
